rules_text:
When Miserable Discovery enters the battlefield, you lose 1 life and create a tapped Treasure token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
{2}{B}, Sacrifice Miserable Discovery: You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.
notes:
QCX
Card draw (for some resource in addition to mana, usually life)
